Workflow_Configurations: Process flow definitions (ANSYS .wbpj, ModelCenter .xml, OpenMDAO .py setup)
Solver_Integration: References to external tools (CFD, FEA, CAD updates)
APIs or scripts for bridging multiple solvers
Parameter_Definitions: Variables, design ranges, step sizes, or distributions (for UQ)
HPC_or_Cloud_Setup: Queue/batch system config, parallel run config
Reference_Data: Previous optimization or param sets for warm start
